greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: Number of preferential arrangements of n labeled elements such that the minimal number of elements per rank equals 3.
link: Alois P. Heinz, Table of n, a(n) for n = 3..400
mathematica: With[{nn=30},CoefficientList[Series[1/(2-Exp[x]+x+x^2/2)-1/(2-Exp[x]+ x+ x^2/2+ x^3/6),{x,0,nn}],x] Range[0,nn]!] (* _Harvey P. Dale_, Feb 14 2016 *)
results.author: _Alois P. Heinz_, Aug 04 2014
